content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ AI-recommended related XDR Data Explorer events now supported in Workbench insight alerts August 27, 2025—AI-recommended related events from XDR Data Explorer in Workbench insight alerts are now supported. To view related XDR Data Explorer events, go to the Alerts tab in a Workbench insight and click the magnifying glass icon. On the Related events panel on the Activities tab, you can view a variety of activities from related XDR Data Explorer events. For more information, see Workbench insights alerts. Agentic SIEM & XDR → Workbench © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: AI-recommended related XDR Data Explorer events now supported in Workbench insight alerts
